extendedInfo.description: Jot, a powerful tool for Ink from Chase cardholders. Manage your business expenses and control your Ink account on-the-go!Make a purchase with your Ink card. Get an instant alert. Add a receipt and tag with custom categories that you create - a few seconds is all it takes. Then, go on to Chase.com and download purchases into your favorite financial software. CONTROL YOUR ACCOUNTâ¢ Make a purchase and get an alert instantlyâ¢ Snap a picture or add a receipt from your photo roll â¢ Tag purchases with customizable categories that you createDOWNLOAD TRANSACTIONSâ¢ Log into your Ink account at Chase.comâ¢ Search and view purchases and receipts â¢ Download into your favorite financial softwareTRACK EMPLOYEE SPENDINGâ¢ Receive instant alerts for employee purchasesâ¢ View every purchase instantlyâ¢ Change employee spending limits If you donât have an Ink from Chase business card or want to learn more about Jot, visit chase.com/inkReviews â¢âChaseâs Ink Jot â¦ acknowledges that those clients are less likely to be tethered to a desk, but are on-the-go and require solutions that allow them to be on top of their business wherever they are.â - Rob Berini, Director of Deloitte Consultingâs Technology Strategy and Architecture (April 2012)â¢ âA glimpse of the future of mobile financeâ â Javelin Strategy and Research (June 2011)â¢ âChase Bank's Jot App Shows the Future of Mobile Transaction Processingâ -NetBanker.com (June 2011)DisclosureThere is no charge from Chase, but message and data rates may apply. Such charges include those from your communications service provider.JPMorgan Chase & Co. Web Site (http://www.chase.com/jot)jot Support (http://www.chase.com/jot)

reviews.title: I really like this ap
reviews.comment: I love the ability to take a pic of receipts.  Improvements would be to add the ability to add notes to each transaction, and to speed the app up a bit.  Nonetheless, it works great on the Galaxy note 2.  I really like it.
reviews.author: Kent Pafford

reviews.title: A weak showing for Chase
reviews.comment: It it weren\'t for the push notifications, I would have installed this app a long time ago. Can\'t upload or tag anything.
reviews.author: Eric Mandel

reviews.comment: Great for company watch credit cards
reviews.author: Edwin Waldner

reviews.title: Crashes constantly
reviews.comment: Tried on my S3 and on my Evo 4GLTE,  as soon as notification arrives app locks up and is non responsive on both phone.  What a shame.
reviews.author: Mark Roisman

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Great idea, poorly implemented by a company that can afford to do it properly. Come on, get it together Chase! Your user experience across the board, with this app and your online banking is garbage. If I download an app to photograph and tag items, then it should be obvious how to do it. How about a button that says \"tag receipt\" and have a check box for the card? Also when I tag a purchase, why do I have to go back to another page to create a new tag? This is not rocket science.
reviews.author: Eric Lampi

reviews.title: Horrible app compared to normal Chase app.
reviews.comment: The normal Chase app is great.  This is embarrassing.  Step it up Chase geeks and make this better.
reviews.author: Mark Loj

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Get an error when I take a photo of the receipt.  C\'mon man!
reviews.author: Dave Heavenridge

reviews.title: can\'t sign in, I just get a blank error dialog
reviews.comment: something went wrong with login, but I wouldn\'t why how or why, because the dialog that pops up is completely blank. No title, no message body, nothing. Great UX bank guys.
reviews.author: Anthony Wu

reviews.title: Very practical app
reviews.comment: Makes business accounting so much easier. Would be better if receipt uploads could be pdf files, not just jpg. And, if I could access older transactions with the app.
reviews.author: Natasha Pyle

reviews.title: would be great if it didn\'t crash all the time
reviews.comment: crashes almost every time I try to upload a receipt after taking a photo.
reviews.author: Mike Ruf

reviews.title: Not for Droid x
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on droid x. Quits with error. So much for commercial that shows great tool for ink users.
reviews.author: Kent Krueger

reviews.title: New for me
reviews.comment: So far so good
reviews.author: Colleen Pisciotta

reviews.title: Good if it worked
reviews.comment: Force closes more often than not after receiving notification to tag a purchase. Also should show more than 60 days of purchases. I love that it notifies you of purchases. This could be a great card fraud alert feature. Update: After getting a new Galaxy Note 2 it doesn\'t force close anymore.  But still has bugs. Like after adding a new tag it gets stuck and you have to hit back. It also sometimes won\'t let you add tags. Also even though push notifications is checked it doesn\'t always work for all accounts.
reviews.author: Joe Hakim

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Service is temporary unavailable, which in my case means since I installed it a couple of days ago. I am also getting a connection error on registering my email account.
reviews.author: Thomas McKenna

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It works well you can add in you financial statment accounts and it makes traking exp a snap.  For the past couple of days te app has not worked... I sure they will fix it soon....
reviews.author: Nick Nissan

reviews.title: Feedback/Improvement Suggestion
reviews.comment: On my galaxy nexus running jelly bean, jot notifications have a gray background with gray text in the notification bar. I\'d suggest using the same semi transparent background that all other android notifications use.  Baring that, at least make the text black.
reviews.author: Brian Hill

reviews.title: Stops Working - Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Most of the time when I get a notification of a purchase and open Jot from the notification area to tag my purchase it stops responding. Very annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: I am surprised Chase released this app in the state it its in. May work on some devices running older versions of Android but doesn\'t work on the latest except for being able to revive an alert when a transaction is processed followed by a program crash. You can manually log in and see the details but cannot \"tag\" transaction items as designed.  Hopefully it will be corrected.
reviews.author: Preston Webb

reviews.title: Avoid. Waste of time.
reviews.comment: What a waste of time. Does NOT work. Plus, records are not available after 60 days. What kind of joke of account tracking software is this? They spent more time making it pretty than functional. Considering Chase only allows business card holders to use Jot, Chase shows they don\'t value or respect their customers\' time, or think that wasting their customer\'s time on cheap gimmicks is all that bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Work
reviews.comment: Logs you out after every tag, also it lags.
reviews.author: Jeremiah San Mejia
